hero.title: I’m Samuel UN
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Junior Full-Stack Developer passionate about building modern, fast and well-structured web applications, specialized in Laravel and React.

about.title: About me
about.p1: I’m a junior Full-Stack Developer with a Higher National Diploma in Web Application Development (DAW) and hands-on experience building end-to-end projects with Laravel and React.
about.p2: I enjoy building modern, fast and well-structured applications, taking care of both the visual layer and the backend logic.
about.p3: I’m currently improving my skills in best practices, performance and user experience while developing personal projects and seeking my first professional opportunity.

nextmovie.title: NextMovie
nextmovie.desc: Movie finder with catalog, detail pages, and favorites. Own API (Laravel) + React frontend. Hybrid SSR/CSR, request caching, and responsive design.

gym-val-gym.title: V.A.L Gym
gym-val-gym.desc: Gym management platform: users, subscriptions and payments. Laravel backend with centralized business logic.

eye-of-the-doom.title: Eye of the Doom
eye-of-the-doom.desc: Interactive game/demo “Eye of the Doom”. Explore levels, gameplay mechanics and visual effects.

collection-fast-and-furious.title: Collection – Fast & Furious
collection-fast-and-furious.desc: Collectibles project inspired by “Fast & Furious”. Interface to view, add and manage car collections with custom motifs.

lanzador-de-programas.title: Lanzador de Programas
lanzador-de-programas.desc: App to manage and launch installed programs on your machine. Simple and functional interface.

hotel-johnnie-walker.title: Hotel Johnnie Walker
hotel-johnnie-walker.desc: Hotel management project: bookings, rooms, services and internal administration.

nexus-consulting.title: Nexus Consulting
nexus-consulting.desc: Consulting project built as a team during your DAW studies: client prototyping, project administration and institutional presentation.

footer.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer · Seville, Spain
